text: Kevin Dean Chan-Yu-Tin (born 11 July 1990) is a Mauritian footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==International== Chan has been involved at Youth level making an appearance for the Canada U-17 National Team at the 2006 CFU Youth Cup. He had also made appearances for the Quebec Provincial side, playing in both National and International tournaments. In April 2016, Chan received a call up to the Mauritius national football team for their 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against Ghana, making an appearance as a substitute. He would make an additional two appearances, including one start in the 2016 COSAFA Cup. Chan-Yu-Tin is eligible to play for Mauritius through his parents. ==References== ==External links== * *Canada Soccer Profile *CAF Profile *Syracuse men's soccer profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Mauritian footballers Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Soccer people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Canadian people of Mauritian descent Category:Mauritius international footballers Category:Mauritian expatriate footballers Category:Canadian expatriate soccer players Category:Canadian expatriates in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Expatriate footballers in Taiwan Category:Syracuse Orange men's soccer players Category:Taiwan Power Company F.C. players Category:Première Ligue de soccer du Québec players
title: Kevin Chan-Yu-Tin
